title: I guess I'm not playing League today...
body:
Downloading patch 8.1 at 4kb/s. Eta is 2700 minutes.

I've never had this problem before, I'm running the client as administrator and I've disabled my firewall. Definitely not a connection problem, everything else is loading fine.

Pls halp.

replies.body: The eta provided could be inaccurate, I wouldn't sweat it too much unless you run into an error.  Is everything okay now?
Only 4GB? ETA 1 minute, that's with patching :B
The should patch be ~100Mb, if it said 4GB it's likely a visual error that's adding up your total size while the patcher is reading over your games files.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0Uu0jWLF,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-01-10T17:27:23.051+0000)
>
> The should patch be ~100Mb, if it said 4GB it's likely a visual error that's adding up your total size while the patcher is reading over your games files.

If it was 100Mb then it would have been done in less than a second.
